column3: utACK, seems reasonably safe. (The actual timeouts are unchanged, just the poll interval.)\n
Correct. Actually, increasing the polling frequency increases the timeouts because you have to add the round trip time in each loop to get the "real" timeout.\n

Doesn't seem to result in any noticable speedup for me. With this patch:

```
ALL                            | True   | 832 s (accumulated)

Runtime: 243 s
```

Without this patch:

```
ALL                            | True   | 838 s (accumulated)

Runtime: 237 s
```
Closing, I think there are better ways to improve runtime.\n
